name: Tistej Andii Nightblade
text:
Wither (This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.) 
 Tap an untapped Tistej Andii you control: Tistej Andii Nightblade gains deathtouch until end of turn.
flavorText: Few have ever seen the Tiste Andii, the inhabitants of the Warren of Darkness, and fewer still have lived to tell the tale.
